checkLeapYears.description: Check if a year is a leap year and get leap year information.
checkLeapYears.shortDescription: Check if a year is a leap year
checkLeapYears.title: Check Leap Years

toolInfo.description: A leap year is a year containing one additional day (February 29) to keep the calendar year synchronized with the astronomical year. Leap years occur every 4 years, except for years that are divisible by 100 but not by 400.
toolInfo.title: What is a Leap Year?

convertDaysToHours.addHoursNameDescription: Append the string hours to output values
convertDaysToHours.description: Convert days to hours with customizable options.
convertDaysToHours.title: Convert Days to Hours

toolInfo.description: This tool allows you to convert days to hours. You can input days as numbers or with units, and the tool will convert them to hours. You can also choose to append the 'hours' suffix to the output values.
toolInfo.title: Convert Days to Hours

convertHoursToDays.addDaysNameDescription: Append the string days to output values
convertHoursToDays.description: Convert hours to days with customizable options.
convertHoursToDays.title: Convert Hours to Days

toolInfo.description: This tool allows you to convert hours to days. You can input hours as numbers or with units, and the tool will convert them to days. You can also choose to append the 'days' suffix to the output values.
toolInfo.title: Convert Hours to Days

convertSecondsToTime.addPaddingDescription: Add zero padding to hours, minutes, and seconds.
convertSecondsToTime.description: Convert seconds to a readable time format (hours:minutes:seconds). Enter the number of seconds to get the formatted time.
convertSecondsToTime.title: Convert Seconds to Time

toolInfo.description: This tool allows you to convert formatted time strings (HH:MM:SS) to seconds. It's useful for calculating durations and time intervals.
toolInfo.title: Convert Time to Seconds

crontabGuru.description: Generate and understand cron expressions. Create cron schedules for automated tasks and system jobs.
crontabGuru.title: Crontab Guru

timeBetweenDates.description: Calculate the time difference between two dates. Get the exact duration in days, hours, minutes, and seconds.
timeBetweenDates.title: Time Between Dates

toolInfo.description: Calculate the exact time difference between two dates and times, with support for different timezones. This tool provides a detailed breakdown of the time difference in various units (years, months, days, hours, minutes, and seconds).
toolInfo.title: Time Between Dates Calculator

truncateClockTime.description: Truncate clock time to remove seconds or minutes. Round time to the nearest hour, minute, or custom interval.
truncateClockTime.shortDescription: Truncate clock time to specified precision
truncateClockTime.title: Truncate Clock Time
truncateClockTime.truncateMinutesAndSecondsDescription: Drop both â€“ the minutes and seconds components from each clock time.
truncateClockTime.truncateOnlySecondsDescription: Drop the seconds component from each clock time.
truncateClockTime.zeroPaddingDescription: Make all time components always be two digits wide.
truncateClockTime.zeroPrintDescription: Display the dropped parts as zero values "00".
